channel.title: Fan Crash
channel.description: As soon as I activate the giant fan which should launch me into the air I get hl2.exe has stopped responding. This has happened three times in a row, it seems to occur when the fan reaches a certain speed. My system is able to run Black Mesa on maximum settings perfectly so that can be ruled out. MDMP is attached. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T19_31_24C0.mdmp (88.3 KB)

item.title: Fan Crash
item.dc:creator: coditza
item.description:
Check if there is a box on top of the fan. If there is, destroy it (remove it in some way) before starting the fan. This fixed it for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Fan Crash
item.dc:creator: Ketran
item.description:
As soon as I activate the giant fan which should launch me into the air I get hl2.exe has stopped responding. This has happened three times in a row, it seems to occur when the fan reaches a certain speed. My system is able to run Black Mesa on maximum settings perfectly so that can be ruled out.

MDMP is attached.
